title: Spanish Prayers
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
And on this time before I could tell
Threw my last wish into the well
And I was making to leave
Just when you said "Won't you come home with me?"
[Verse 2]
And as we walk I tell you the tale
Of when I was so broke, wounded and frailed
They built a statue of me
Standing right there
[?] from the arms of the chair
Filled up my lungs with [?] air
[?] inside a jumping balloon
[Chorus]
We’re running into our love
Banging a spanish drum
Locked in a cathedral
Drinking the spanish rum
We are members of a clan
Even if they don't care
Blowing all the speakers
Singing a spanish prayer slowly
[Verse 3]
[?] tears right to my eyes
What a surprise
That I'm here watching you now
Getting undressed
[?] dreams with their hearts on their sleeves
In the middle of a night makes me cry
That I’m looking for you standing right there

[Chorus]
We're running into our love
Banging a spanish drum
Then we're locked in a cathedral
Drinking the spanish rum
We are members of a clan
Even if they don't care
Blowing all the speakers
Singing a spanish prayer slowly
